original_text: Tell us, Job, what things we should say to God. We cannot argue with him, because our minds are in a dark place. Tell us, Job, what things we should say to God. We cannot argue with him, because our minds are in a dark place. Tell us, Job, what things we should say to God.
korean_text: 우리가 그에게 할 말을 그대는 우리에게 가르치라 우리는 아둔하여 아뢰지 못하겠노라

sentences.original_text: Tell us, Job, what things we should say
sentences.korean_translation: 욥아, 우리가 무엇을 말해야 할지 말해다오

sentences.original_text: because our minds are in a dark place
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 우리의 마음은 어두운 곳에 있기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: Tell us, Job, what things we should say
sentences.korean_translation: 욥아, 우리가 무엇을 말해야 할지 말해다오

sentences.original_text: because our minds are in a dark place
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 우리의 마음은 어두운 곳에 있기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: Tell us, Job, what things we should say to God
sentences.korean_translation: 욥아, 우리가 하나님께 무엇을 말해야 할지 말해다오
